features: SUITABLE FOR DELICATE SKIN: AVEENO Baby Daily Care 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner is specially formulated to cleanse, condition and nourish baby’s fine hair and scalp, without drying. It leaves hair easy to comb, feeling soft and healthy. Its mild formulation can be used daily.
FORMULATED WITH NATURAL OAT EXTRACT: Specially formulated for baby’s delicate hair, this 2-in-1 formula leaves hair soft, smooth and easy to manage
GENTLY CLEANSES AND CONDITIONS HAIR and SCALP
BOTTLE IS MADE WITH 50 percent RECYCLED PLASTIC and IS 100 percent RECYCLABLE
description:
Product Description Formulated with Natural Oat Extract, AVEENOBaby Daily Care 2-in-1 Shampoo & Conditioner is designed for baby’s delicate hair. This 2-in-1 formula leaves hair soft, smooth and easy to manage, without drying. Its mild formulation can be used daily.

AVEENOBaby Daily Care 2-in-1 Shampoo & Conditioner gently cleanses and conditions the hair and scalp, and nourishes for easy combing. It is lightly scented, pH-balanced, tear-free and free from sulphates, soap and dyes. 

Our new bottle is made with 50 % recycled plastic and is 100% recyclable. 

At AVEENOBaby we carefully select high quality oats to preserve their protective, moisturising and soothing properties. 

About AVEENOBaby
Our AVEENOBaby products are specially formulated to provide daily care to soothing care for your little one. AVEENOBaby products are paediatrician and dermatologist tested, and dye free. They nourish, soothe & protect sensitive baby skin from the 1st use. Ingredients [Pr-0001347], Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-glucoside, Glycerin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil, Polyquaternium-10, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Lecithin, Glyceryl Oleate, Laureth-4, Coconut Acid, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Chloride, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Formic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Product And Ingredients May Change. Always Check The Label Before Purchasing And Using This Product Directions Wet hair, massage in, lather, rinse thoroughly Safety Warning Warning: keep out of reach of children. For external use only. See more
